mapper.sql: ID_ AS "id", REV_ AS "rev", EXECUTION_ID_ AS "executionId", PROC_INST_ID_ AS "procInstId", PROC_DEF_ID_ AS "procDefId", NAME_ AS "name", PARENT_TASK_ID_ AS "parentTaskId", DESCRIPTION_ AS "description", TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS "taskDefKey", OWNER_ AS "owner", ASSIGNEE_ AS "assignee", DELEGATION_ AS "delegation", PRIORITY_ AS "priority", CREATE_TIME_ AS "createTime", DUE_DATE_ AS "dueDate", CATEGORY_ AS "category", SUSPENSION_STATE_ AS "suspensionState", TENANT_ID_ AS "tenantId", FORM_KEY_ AS "formKey", CLAIM_TIME_ AS "claimTime"

ID_ AS "id_", PROC_DEF_ID_ AS "proc_def_id_", TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS "task_def_key_", PROC_INST_ID_ AS "proc_inst_id_", EXECUTION_ID_ AS "execution_id_", NAME_ AS "name_", PARENT_TASK_ID_ AS "parent_task_id_", DESCRIPTION_ AS "description_", OWNER_ AS "owner_", ASSIGNEE_ AS "assignee_", START_TIME_ AS "start_time_", CLAIM_TIME_ AS "claim_time_", END_TIME_ AS "end_time_", DURATION_ AS "duration_", DELETE_REASON_ AS "delete_reason_", PRIORITY_ AS "priority_", DUE_DATE_ AS "due_date_", FORM_KEY_ AS "form_key_", CATEGORY_ AS "category_", TENANT_ID_ AS "tenant_id_"
mapper.select:
select f.*, p.NAME_ pname_ , p.DEPLOYMENT_ID_ deployment_id_, p.DGRM_RESOURCE_NAME_ dgrm_resource_name_ from ( select
from ACT_HI_TASKINST n where ( n.ASSIGNEE_ = #{pd.username} or n.ASSIGNEE_ in ${pd.rnumbers} ) group by n.EXECUTION_ID_
) f left join ACT_RE_PROCDEF p on f.PROC_DEF_ID_ = p.ID_ where 1=1
and ( p.NAME_ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or f.NAME_ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or f.ASSIGNEE_ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') )
and f.END_TIME_ >= CONCAT(#{pd.lastStart},' 00:00:00')
and f.END_TIME_ <= CONCAT(#{pd.lastEnd},' 23:59:59')
and ( f.ASSIGNEE_ = #{pd.username} or f.ASSIGNEE_ in ${pd.rnumbers} )
and f.END_TIME_ is not NULL order by f.END_TIME_ desc

select f.*, p.NAME_ pname_ , p.DEPLOYMENT_ID_ deployment_id_, p.DGRM_RESOURCE_NAME_ dgrm_resource_name_ from ( select
from ACT_HI_TASKINST n where ( n.ASSIGNEE_ = #{pd.username} or n.ASSIGNEE_ in ${pd.rnumbers} ) group by n.EXECUTION_ID_
) f left join ACT_RE_PROCDEF p on f.PROC_DEF_ID_ = p.ID_ where 1=1
and ( p.NAME_ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or f.NAME_ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or f.ASSIGNEE_ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') )
and f.END_TIME_ >= CONCAT(#{pd.lastStart},' 00:00:00')
and f.END_TIME_ <= CONCAT(#{pd.lastEnd},' 23:59:59')
and ( f.ASSIGNEE_ = #{pd.username} or f.ASSIGNEE_ in ${pd.rnumbers} )
and f.END_TIME_ is not NULL order by f.END_TIME_ desc

select f.*, p.NAME_ pname_ , p.DEPLOYMENT_ID_ deployment_id_, p.DGRM_RESOURCE_NAME_ dgrm_resource_name_ from ( select n.EXECUTION_ID_,n.ASSIGNEE_,n.NAME_,n.END_TIME_,n.PROC_DEF_ID_,n.DURATION_,n.ID_,n.TASK_DEF_KEY_,n.PROC_INST_ID_,n.PARENT_TASK_ID_ ,n.DESCRIPTION_,n.OWNER_,n.START_TIME_,n.CLAIM_TIME_,n.DELETE_REASON_,n.PRIORITY_,DUE_DATE_,n.FORM_KEY_,n.CATEGORY_,n.TENANT_ID_ from ACT_HI_TASKINST n where ( n.ASSIGNEE_ = #{pd.username} or n.ASSIGNEE_ in ${pd.rnumbers} ) group by n.EXECUTION_ID_,n.ASSIGNEE_,n.NAME_,n.END_TIME_,n.PROC_DEF_ID_,n.DURATION_,n.ID_,n.TASK_DEF_KEY_,n.PROC_INST_ID_,n.PARENT_TASK_ID_ ,n.DESCRIPTION_,n.OWNER_,n.START_TIME_,n.CLAIM_TIME_,n.DELETE_REASON_,n.PRIORITY_,DUE_DATE_,n.FORM_KEY_,n.CATEGORY_,n.TENANT_ID_ ) f left join ACT_RE_PROCDEF p on f.PROC_DEF_ID_ = p.ID_ where 1=1
and ( p.NAME_ LIKE '%' || #{pd.keywords} || '%' or f.NAME_ LIKE '%' || #{pd.keywords} || '%' or f.ASSIGNEE_ LIKE '%' || #{pd.keywords} || '%' )
and f.END_TIME_ >= to_timestamp(#{pd.lastStart}||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and f.END_TIME_ <= to_timestamp(#{pd.lastEnd}||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and ( f.ASSIGNEE_ = #{pd.username} or f.ASSIGNEE_ in ${pd.rnumbers} )
and f.END_TIME_ is not NULL order by f.END_TIME_ desc

select f.*, p.NAME_ "pname_" , p.DEPLOYMENT_ID_ "deployment_id_", p.DGRM_RESOURCE_NAME_ "dgrm_resource_name_" from ( select
from ACT_HI_TASKINST n where ( n.ASSIGNEE_ = #{pd.username} or n.ASSIGNEE_ in ${pd.rnumbers} ) group by n.EXECUTION_ID_,n.ASSIGNEE_,n.NAME_,n.END_TIME_,n.PROC_DEF_ID_,n.DURATION_,n.ID_,n.TASK_DEF_KEY_,n.PROC_INST_ID_,n.PARENT_TASK_ID_ ,n.DESCRIPTION_,n.OWNER_,n.START_TIME_,n.CLAIM_TIME_,n.DELETE_REASON_,n.PRIORITY_,DUE_DATE_,n.FORM_KEY_,n.CATEGORY_,n.TENANT_ID_ ) f left join ACT_RE_PROCDEF p on f."proc_def_id_" = p.ID_ where 1=1
and ( p.name_ LIKE '%' || #{pd.keywords} || '%' or f."name_" LIKE '%' || #{pd.keywords} || '%' or f."assignee_" LIKE '%' || #{pd.keywords} || '%' )
and f."end_time_" >= to_date(#{pd.lastStart}||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and f."end_time_" <= to_date(#{pd.lastEnd}||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and ( f."assignee_" = #{pd.username} or f."assignee_" in ${pd.rnumbers} )
and f."end_time_" is not NULL order by f."end_time_" desc

select
from act_ru_task where 1 = 1
and NAME_ like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.name},'%')

select
from act_ru_task where 1 = 1
and NAME_ like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.name},'%')

select f.ID_ AS "id", f.REV_ AS "rev", f.EXECUTION_ID_ AS "executionId", f.PROC_INST_ID_ AS "procInstId", f.PROC_DEF_ID_ AS "procDefId", f.NAME_ AS "name", f.PARENT_TASK_ID_ AS "parentTaskId", f.DESCRIPTION_ AS "description", f.TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS "taskDefKey", f.OWNER_ AS "owner", f.ASSIGNEE_ AS "assignee", f.DELEGATION_ AS "delegation", f.PRIORITY_ AS "priority", f.CREATE_TIME_ AS "createTime", f.DUE_DATE_ AS "dueDate", f.CATEGORY_ AS "category", f.SUSPENSION_STATE_ AS "suspensionState", f.TENANT_ID_ AS "tenantId", f.FORM_KEY_ AS "formKey", f.CLAIM_TIME_ AS "claimTime", p.NAME_ as "pname", p.DGRM_RESOURCE_NAME_ as "dgrmResourceName" from act_ru_task f left join ACT_RE_PROCDEF p on f.PROC_DEF_ID_ = p.ID_ where 1=1
and ( p.NAME_ LIKE '%' || #{paramCondition.keywords} || '%' or f.NAME_ LIKE '%' || #{paramCondition.keywords} || '%' or f.ASSIGNEE_ LIKE '%' || #{paramCondition.keywords} || '%' )
and f.CREATE_TIME_ >= to_timestamp(#{paramCondition.lastStart}||'00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and f.CREATE_TIME_ <= to_timestamp(#{paramCondition.lastEnd}||'23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and ( f.ASSIGNEE_ = #{paramCondition.username} or f.ASSIGNEE_ in ${paramCondition.username} )
order by f.CREATE_TIME_ desc

select f.ID_ AS "id", f.REV_ AS "rev", f.EXECUTION_ID_ AS "executionId", f.PROC_INST_ID_ AS "procInstId", f.PROC_DEF_ID_ AS "procDefId", f.NAME_ AS "name", f.PARENT_TASK_ID_ AS "parentTaskId", f.DESCRIPTION_ AS "description", f.TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS "taskDefKey", f.OWNER_ AS "owner", f.ASSIGNEE_ AS "assignee", f.DELEGATION_ AS "delegation", f.PRIORITY_ AS "priority", f.CREATE_TIME_ AS "createTime", f.DUE_DATE_ AS "dueDate", f.CATEGORY_ AS "category", f.SUSPENSION_STATE_ AS "suspensionState", f.TENANT_ID_ AS "tenantId", f.FORM_KEY_ AS "formKey", f.CLAIM_TIME_ AS "claimTime", p.NAME_ as "pname", p.DGRM_RESOURCE_NAME_ as "dgrmResourceName" from act_ru_task f left join ACT_RE_PROCDEF p on f.PROC_DEF_ID_ = p.ID_ where 1=1
and ( p.NAME_ LIKE '%' || #{paramCondition.keywords} || '%' or f.NAME_ LIKE '%' || #{paramCondition.keywords} || '%' or f.ASSIGNEE_ LIKE '%' || #{paramCondition.keywords} || '%' )
and f.CREATE_TIME_ >= to_date(#{paramCondition.lastStart}||'00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and f.CREATE_TIME_ <= to_date(#{paramCondition.lastEnd}||'23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and ( f.ASSIGNEE_ = #{paramCondition.username} or f.ASSIGNEE_ in ${paramCondition.username} )
order by f.CREATE_TIME_ desc

select f.ID_ AS "id", f.REV_ AS "rev", f.EXECUTION_ID_ AS "executionId", f.PROC_INST_ID_ AS "procInstId", f.PROC_DEF_ID_ AS "procDefId", f.NAME_ AS "name", f.PARENT_TASK_ID_ AS "parentTaskId", f.DESCRIPTION_ AS "description", f.TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS "taskDefKey", f.OWNER_ AS "owner", f.ASSIGNEE_ AS "assignee", f.DELEGATION_ AS "delegation", f.PRIORITY_ AS "priority", f.CREATE_TIME_ AS "createTime", f.DUE_DATE_ AS "dueDate", f.CATEGORY_ AS "category", f.SUSPENSION_STATE_ AS "suspensionState", f.TENANT_ID_ AS "tenantId", f.FORM_KEY_ AS "formKey", f.CLAIM_TIME_ AS "claimTime", p.NAME_ as "pname", p.DGRM_RESOURCE_NAME_ as "dgrmResourceName" from act_ru_task f left join ACT_RE_PROCDEF p on f.PROC_DEF_ID_ = p.ID_ where 1=1
and ( p.NAME_ LIKE '%' || #{paramCondition.keywords} || '%' or f.NAME_ LIKE '%' || #{paramCondition.keywords} || '%' or f.ASSIGNEE_ LIKE '%' || #{paramCondition.keywords} || '%' )
and f.CREATE_TIME_ >= to_timestamp(#{paramCondition.lastStart},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and f.CREATE_TIME_ <= to_timestamp(#{paramCondition.lastEnd},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and ( f.ASSIGNEE_ = #{paramCondition.username} or f.ASSIGNEE_ in ${paramCondition.username} )
order by f.CREATE_TIME_ desc

select f.ID_ AS "id", f.REV_ AS "rev", f.EXECUTION_ID_ AS "executionId", f.PROC_INST_ID_ AS "procInstId", f.PROC_DEF_ID_ AS "procDefId", f.NAME_ AS "name", f.PARENT_TASK_ID_ AS "parentTaskId", f.DESCRIPTION_ AS "description", f.TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS "taskDefKey", f.OWNER_ AS "owner", f.ASSIGNEE_ AS "assignee", f.DELEGATION_ AS "delegation", f.PRIORITY_ AS "priority", f.CREATE_TIME_ AS "createTime", f.DUE_DATE_ AS "dueDate", f.CATEGORY_ AS "category", f.SUSPENSION_STATE_ AS "suspensionState", f.TENANT_ID_ AS "tenantId", f.FORM_KEY_ AS "formKey", f.CLAIM_TIME_ AS "claimTime", p.NAME_ as "pname", p.DGRM_RESOURCE_NAME_ as "dgrmResourceName" from act_ru_task f left join ACT_RE_PROCDEF p on f.PROC_DEF_ID_ = p.ID_ where 1=1
and ( p.NAME_ LIKE '%' || #{paramCondition.keywords} || '%' or f.NAME_ LIKE '%' || #{paramCondition.keywords} || '%' or f.ASSIGNEE_ LIKE '%' || #{paramCondition.keywords} || '%' )
and f.CREATE_TIME_ >= to_date(#{paramCondition.lastStart},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and f.CREATE_TIME_ <= to_date(#{paramCondition.lastEnd},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and ( f.ASSIGNEE_ = #{paramCondition.username} or f.ASSIGNEE_ in ${paramCondition.username} )
order by f.CREATE_TIME_ desc
